channel.title: Mark's Prayer Site
channel.description: Recent content on Mark's Prayer Site

item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: November 19, 2025 Today's Verse James 1:13–14 [13] Let no one say when he is tempted, “I am being tempted by God,” for God cannot be tempted with evil, and he himself tempts no one. [14] But each person is tempted when he is lured and enticed by his own desire. Today's Memory Verse Ephesians 6:12 - For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness, against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places.
